result.eng: He will be completely satisfied with it.
result.html: Beidh sé lán-sásta leisHe will be completely satisfied with it.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ sé lán-sásta leisHe will be completely satisfied with it.

result.eng: He could not be satisfied. There was no satisfying him.
result.ga: Ní raibh sásamh le déanamh air
result.orig: Ní raibh sásamh le déanamh air
result.html: Ní raibh sásamh le déanamh airHe could not be satisfied. There was no satisfying him.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ sásaṁ le déanaṁ airHe could not be satisfied. There was no satisfying him.
